title: Deportivo Santa Cecilia
text:
Corporación Deportiva Santa Cecilia is a <a href="Nicaragua">Nicaragua</a>n <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team that used to play at the top level.
History.
Based in <a href="Diriamba">Diriamba</a>, Santa Cecilia was once one of the dominant powers in Nicaraguan football. They won national titles in 1961, 1965, and then three straight from 1971-73. The ensuing years have not been kind to Santa Cecilia, and they currently play in the third division.
List of Managers.
Salon de la fama de Nicaragua
